name: SCP: First Encounter [BETA]
description:
We are very excited to announce our BEST project, SCP: First Encounter. This is the beta version. This is only one level, we plan on having a huge amount of them! We hope you enjoy. We are currently working on getting it on other systems. You may also join our discord:

If the game is not loading, please contact us, we are working to fix this pronto!
